Scriptal.Name: Print Variable (DEBUG)
Scriptal.Description: Prints a variable and its contents, for debugging purposes.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: InfCore.DebugPrint("Variable Debug Info:") InfCore.DebugPrint("|[1|STRING,NUMBER,TABLE,BOOLEAN]|: " .. tostring(|[1|STRING,NUMBER,TABLE,BOOLEAN]|) .. " (".. type(|[1|STRING,NUMBER,TABLE,BOOLEAN]|) ..")") if type(|[1|STRING,NUMBER,TABLE,BOOLEAN]|) == "table" then for tempK, tempV in pairs(|[1|STRING,NUMBER,TABLE,BOOLEAN]|) do InfCore.DebugPrint("[" .. tostring(tempK) .. "] (" .. type(tempK) .. ") = " .. tostring(tempV) .. " (" .. type(tempV) .. ")") if type(tempV) == "table" then for nestedTempK, nestedTempV in pairs(tempV) do InfCore.DebugPrint(tostring(tempK) .. ": [" .. tostring(nestedTempK) .. "] (" .. type(nestedTempK) .. ") = " .. tostring(nestedTempV) .. " (" .. type(nestedTempV) .. ")") end end end end

Choice.Name: Variable
Choice.Description: The variable that will be printed in-game.
